::Dark Lavatron::

Astral fires two missiles as he dives under several shots, taking out 
one of the two EMPs which were still functional. He spins around to 
see several bots arrive at battle.

Astral smiles. New targets..

"Lavacons, UNITE!" he yells out. Fenox, Starlight, Griplash, and 
Recklessa all transform into various body-parts. Shots whizz past 
them as they combine, forming the giant Dark Lavatron.

Dark Lavatron laughs. "Feel my wrath, Maximal!" He yells out in a 
deep voice, stomping toward Snow Tech and Shadow Cat and firing 
missiles down at them. A missile hits the ground, flames rushing 
across the grassland. The ground shakes as his feet make large 
imprints in it.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Alten Gould" <beastwarsaddress@h...> 
wrote:
> 
> *The little fuzz ball looked up at Iron Raptor, He understood what 
she 
> said,and would do what she asked. When she landed, he crawled up 
over her 
> back and into her, closing the door behind him with his teeth.*
> 
> * SHadow Cat landed beside them, dropping Snow Tech onto his butt. 
He 
> grimaced and rubbed his gluteous maximus when he got up. He turned 
and shot 
> Shadow Cat a dirty look.*
> 
> " You didn't have to drop me! You could'a set me down instead!"
> 
> * HSadow Cat stuck out het tounge and spoke*
> 
> " That would take all the fun out of flying you fat ass all over!"
> 
> * Shew grinned and turned to Iron*
> 
> " What now?"
>
